ucpisection_header: An haɗa da biyan kuɗi na Crypto (UCPI) na musamman wanda Paycio ya haɓaka don kunna ma'amala mara iyaka.
ucpisection_line: Tare da taimakonta, masu amfani na iya musanya da yawa chinptocurrencies a cikin dandamali guda.
ucpisection_uniqline: Paycio ba kawai game da biyan bukatun Crypto ba.
ucpisection_uniqline2: Duk abin da kuke buƙata shine lambar waya.
ucpisection_header2: Tabbatar da asali dangane da lambar waya
ucpisection_line1: Paycio ba zai iya haɗa abubuwa daban-daban ba, suna ba da izinin kuɗi mai sauri da tsada a ƙasan sarƙoƙi.
ucpisection_line2: Hukumarmu tana sauƙaƙe tsarin aiwatarwa da tabbacin KYC.
ucpisection_line3: Tare da kayan aikinmu, kuna samun damar yin amfani da irin waɗannan fasalulluka azaman biyan crypto mai sauƙi, ma'amaloli na biyan kuɗi, biyan kuɗi, da kuma biyan kuɗi, da ƙididdigar wucewa.
ucpisection_line4: Paycio yana haifar da warware matsalar don magance matsalar disjeron crypto sabis kuma don inganta kwarewar mai amfani, gami da C2c, B2B, da mafita na B2C don 'yan kasuwa.
ucpisection_needline: Ka yi tunanin kana da tarin kayan wallets na agogo daban-daban - rupeses, daloli, rubles da ƙari.
ucpisection_needline1: Mun magance matsalar kewaya wuraren shakatawa da yawa, abubuwan toshe.com aiyuka, da musayar.
ucpisection_needline2: Paycio yana sauƙaƙe biyan kuɗin ƙwallon ƙafa don inganta taro tallafi na fasahar burgewa.
ucpisection_needline3: Muna sauƙaƙe aiwatar da ayyukan KyC don taimakawa masu amfani da sauri sun wuce tabbataccen shaida yayin da biyo bayan buƙatun mahaɗan da haɓaka amana.
ucpisection_needline4: Kayan aikinmu yana faɗaɗa karfin biyan kuɗi kuma yana sanya duk aikin sauƙaƙa don kasuwanci da mutane.
ucpisection_participantsline1: Dandamalinmu yana da kyau dacewa ga ƙungiyoyi daban-daban, kamar su:
ucpisection_partheader1: Kasuwanci da zasu iya haɗa kayan aikin biyan kuɗi na biyan kuɗi a cikin tafiyarsu

ucpibenefits_line: Ga hukumomi, UCPI yana tsaye a matsayin mai taimako.
ucpibenefits_line1: Saboda ma'amaloli masu asirci mai gaskiya, UCPI yana da damar zuwa mafi girman haraji.
ucpibenefits_line2: Fasaharmu tana ba da fannoni daban-daban na 'yan ƙasa tare da sabis na kuɗi ta hanyar tabbaci mai sauƙi.
ucpibenefits_line3: Mun gina babbar matsala ta Colto Ecosystem, tana jan hankalin masu saka hannun jari da masu kirkiro daga ko'ina cikin duniya.
ucpibenefits_line4: UCPI yana ba da cikakken sakamako mai inganci na ma'amaloli na Crypto, suna magance damuwar gudanarwa game da ayyukan ba bisa ƙa'ida ba.
ucpibenefits_insightsline: UCPI yana aiki kamar gada ta haɗa shinge daban-daban a cikin dandamali guda, yin amfani da Crypto mai sauƙi, da sauri, kuma mafi aminci.
ucpibenefits_insightsheader3: Tasiri akan tsarin biyan kudi na gargajiya
ucpibenefits_insightsline1: UCPI ya kalubalance ayyukan tallafin na gargajiya ta hanyar sauƙaƙe biyan kan iyaka da rage farashin.
ucpibenefits_insightsline2: A matsayinka na dandamalin biyan P2P na P2P na duniya, Paycio yana goyan bayan babban adadin kuɗin Fiat.
ucpibenefits_insightsline3: UCPI na nufin rushe tsarin biyan kuɗi na gargajiya ta hanyar ba da sauri, mai rahusa, da mafi aminci madadin.

referfaq_header1: Me zai faru da tsabar kudi na idan na shiga ba tare da wani magana ba?
referfaq_header2: Me yasa tsabar kudi suka canza zuwa asusun kamfanin ta hanyar tsohuwa?

referfaq_header4: Ta yaya zan iya hulɗa da goyan baya don ƙarin bayani ko taimako?
referfaq_header5: Mene ne lada ga tsarin ma'amaloli?
referfaq_header6: Ta yaya zan shiga cikin lada ga tsarin ma'amaloli?
referfaq_content1: Ta hanyar tsoho, idan ka shiga ba tare da wani waƙa ba, za a tura kuɗin ku zuwa asusun kamfanin.
referfaq_content2: Wannan tsarin tsoho yana taimakawa gudanarwar layin dogo kuma yana tabbatar da nuna gaskiya a tsarin saiti.
referfaq_content3: Canja wuri na ainihi zuwa asusun kamfanin da aka tsara don gudanar da tsabar kudin, yana ba da damar ƙarin bin sawu da kuma haɓaka tsabar kudi, ayyukan ci gaba, da haɓaka al'umma, da haɓaka al'umma gaba ɗaya.
referfaq_content4: Ga kowane tambaya ko damuwa dangane da yarjejeniya, ko wasu batutuwan da suka shafi su, da fatan za a tuntuɓi ƙungiyar goyan baya ta hanyar tashoshi da aka tsara akan dandamali.
referfaq_content5: Sakamakon fasalin ma'amaloli shine wani shiri na musamman wanda ke ba da masu amfani da abubuwan ƙarfafawa dangane da yawan ma'amaloli da suke gudanarwa.
referfaq_content6: Mahalarta waɗanda suka cancanci a ƙara su atomatik.

termsconditions_line2: Waɗannan sharuɗɗan da yanayi (da 'sharuɗɗan') Roady CryptoToctertocy Biyan Kuɗi ('Ayyukan').
termsconditions_line4: Aikin Paycio yana sauƙaƙe aiwatar da canja wurin kuɗi ta amfani da lambar wayar hannu, yana ba da ma'amala mai sauƙi tare da famfo mai sauƙi akan na'urarku ta hannu.
termsconditions_line5: A cikin ainihin kwarewar Paycio shine keɓaɓɓiyar biyan kuɗi na Crypto (UCPI).
termsconditions_line6: UCPI Autt matsewar kayan aikin digalist ɗin na dijital, yana tallafawa abokin ciniki-don abokin ciniki (C2C), kasuwancin kasuwanci (B2b), da kuma ma'amala ta kasuwanci (B2C).
termsconditions_line7: Ta hanyar leverarging ucpi, Paycio yana tabbatar da rashin ingantaccen tsarin dijital ne kawai amma kuma ingantaccen biyan kuɗi da ƙimar ainihi ta hanyar lambobin wayar hannu.
termsconditions_line8: Masu ba da labari ga masu siye
termsconditions_line9: Paycio yana ba da sabis don biyan kuɗin cryptocurrency.
termsconditions_line10: Saboda yanayin maras tabbas na kasuwar Cryptotowerrency, muna ba da shawara ga masu siyarwa don fahimtar haɗarin da ya ƙunsa.
termsconditions_line12: Waɗannan sharuɗɗan amfani da su (da 'sharuɗɗan') Road da samfuran Paycio, da duk wasu fasali da suka danganci sabis na karɓar kuɗin da ake biyan kuɗi (da 'karɓar sabis na karbuwa').
termsconditions_line13: Ta amfani da sabis ɗin karɓa ta yanar gizo na Payccio, API, ko wani matsakaici, ku ('' 'ku' 'ko' ku 'ko' ku 'ko' ku ') ko' ku ') ko' ku ') ko' ku ') ko' ku ') ko' ku ') ko' ku
termsconditions_line15: Paycio ya yi bin dokokin dokokin Amurka da ka'idoji na banki, da kuma tsarin takunkumin hukuntun na Baibul da Ma'aikatar Tattara da Kasuwancin Kasuwanci
termsconditions_line16: Paycio kasuwanci ne na sabis tare da ayyukan da aka yi rijistar kudi (fincen) na Ma'aikatar Baitul Matallan Amurka a Jiha inda Dokokin da Aka Kama Yana buƙatar irin wannan lasisin.
termsconditions_line17: Bugu da ƙari, Paycio ya haɗu da ƙa'idodin Holland da EU, gami da dokar Dutch a kan rigakafin karkatar da ta'addanci ('WWFTETETET 1977).
termsconditions_line19: Ta amfani da sabis na Paycio, kun yarda ku bi ta hanyar waɗannan sharuɗɗan da duk wani dokokin da aka zartar ko ƙa'idodi.
termsconditions_line21: Waɗannan sharuɗɗan suna gudana ne da dokokin [sa hukunci], kuma duk magunguna ta samo asali daga waɗannan sharuɗɗan za su ke ƙarƙashin ikon kotun da ke cikin [sa hukunci].
termsconditions_line24: Kowane mutum ya karbi wadannan sharuɗɗan a madadin dan kasuwa na shekaru ne na shekaru kuma yana da ikon da ya wajaba a kan dan kasuwa.
termsconditions_line25: Maiyancin kasuwancinku yana cikin tsari mai kyau, mai inganci, a cikin kyakkyawan yanayi a ƙarƙashin dokokin jihar da ƙasar ta samuwar, kuma yana da ƙwarewa da kyau a cikin ikon kasuwancinsa yana buƙatar zama.
termsconditions_line26: A lokacin da ka yarda da waɗannan sharuɗɗan, kai ba mabukaci bane kamar yadda aka ayyana shi kuma ya yi amfani da kasuwannin kudade na Dutch (Burggerizk Werboek).
termsconditions_line27: Dole ne ku tabbatar da cewa amfanin karatun ku baya keta kowane ɗayan ƙasashen duniya da aka zartar, Tarayya, jiha, ko dokokin gida ko dokoki, gami da dokokin haraji.
termsconditions_line28: Duk bayanan da ka bayar gare mu, kuma na iya ba mu a gaba, shine kuma za a ci gaba da kasancewa da gaskiya kuma cikakke.
termsconditions_line30: Ka yarda kar ka shiga cikin abubuwan da aka haramta yayin amfani da sabis na karbuwa ko yin hulɗa tare da wasu masu amfani ko kuma bangarori na uku.
termsconditions_line31: Idan baku da tabbas ko amfanin ku na karɓar waɗannan rukunan ko kuna da wasu tambayoyi game da yadda waɗannan dokoki suka shafi ku, don Allah ku yi mana imel a
termsconditions_line33: Shiga cikin ayyukan da ke keta ko taimakawa game da keta dokoki, doka, da tsarin takunkumi, ko tsarin takunkumi na ofishin baitulmalin ƙasar ke sarrafawa (OFC) da Dokar Sakunkunan Dutch.
termsconditions_line35: Ayyuka waɗanda ke gabatar da manyan abubuwa marasa ma'ana a kan ababen mu, ko kuma wannan tsoma baki tare da kowane tsarin, bayanai, ko bayani.
termsconditions_line36: Ayyukan da suka saba wa juna:
termsconditions_line37: Ayyukan da suka yi cewa, zagi, ƙiƙai, ƙarfafawa, barazana, barazana, ko ƙeta hakkin doka game da wasu, ciki har da haƙƙin mallaka, da haƙƙin mallaka na ilimi.
termsconditions_line39: Duk wani aiki da aka yi niyyar kafa Paycio, masu amfani da mu, ko kowane ɓangare na uku.
termsconditions_line41: Ma'amarin da ya shafi abubuwa waɗanda ke haifar da cewa keta kowane haƙƙin mallaka, alamar kasuwanci, ko kowane haƙƙin mallaka na ƙarƙashin doka.
termsconditions_line43: Idan kun shiga kowane nau'in kasuwancin, ayyukan kasuwanci, ko abubuwa don siyarwa, za a yarda kawai ku shiga cikin ba da izini.
termsconditions_line44: Wannan jeri ba shi da rauni, kuma muna ajiye 'yancin sabunta shi a kowane lokaci.
termsconditions_line45: Idan baku da tabbas ko amfanin ku na karɓar sabis ɗin da kuke amfani da kasuwancinku ko kuna da tambayoyi game da yadda waɗannan dokoki suka shafi ku, tuntuɓi mu a
termsconditions_line46: Nemi don takardu da dama don bincika bayanan
termsconditions_line47: Paycio, masu dubata, mai aiwatar da tsari wanda aka zartar na iya neman kuma bincika wasu takaddun kasuwanci daga gare ku, ko da zaran doka, ko kuma wata doka ta buƙata.
termsconditions_line49: Muna da 'yancin ƙi bayar da sabis na karbuwa gare ku ko kuma nan da nan da ake zarginsu, idan muka yi amfani da su ko kuma za ka koya ko kuma za ka yi amfani da su ko kuma za ka koya ko kuma wata doka ta amfani da ita.
termsconditions_line50: Bugu da ƙari, muna riƙe da damar saka idanu, bincika, riƙe duk wani bayani kamar yadda ake buƙata don bin duk wata doka da aka zartar, tsari, ko buƙatar takunkumi, tsari na doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko roƙon doka, ko bukatar shari'a, ko bukatar shari'a, ko bukatar doka.
termsconditions_line51: Idan asusunku ba shi da ma'amala da aka biya don fiye da watanni goma sha biyu a jere, muna kiyaye haƙƙin dakatar da shi kuma dakatar da damar aiki.
termsconditions_line53: Idan an rufe asusunka ga kowane dalili, kun yarda da waɗannan:
termsconditions_line54: (a) Za ku ci gaba da kasancewa da haɗuwa da tsarin rabo daga waɗannan sharuɗɗan.
termsconditions_line55: (b) Za ka daina yin amfani da ayyukan karban.
termsconditions_line56: (c) LABARIN LAFIYA ya samar a ƙarƙashin waɗannan sharuɗɗan zai ƙare.

faqpagetext_line27: Shin dole ne in gabatar da wasu takardu don buɗe asusun Paycio?

faqpagetext_line29: Me yasa zan kammala tantancewar KyC?

ucpipagetext_line1: Kwarewar mafita ta gaba-na Gen crypto.
ucpipagetext_line2: An haɗa da biyan kuɗi na Crypto (UCPI) babban dandamali na toshewar Tukwali na BustChain da ke ba da izinin Wallpets da sabis na Banki na Yanar gizo cikin aikace-aikacen abokantaka.
ucpipagetext_line4: Ta hanyar haɗawa da asusun ajiyar kuɗi tare da sabis na Banki, UCPI yana ba da damar 'yan kasuwa da masu amfani su saya, siyarwa, da kuma sarrafa Crypftowrencies tare da Hassle.
ucpipagetext_line5: Paycio's UCPI yana sauƙaƙe biyan kuɗi
ucpipagetext_line7: UCPI ya basu damar amfani da masu amfani zuwa cryptocurrencies a kan kaya da sabis a duniya ta hanyar amintattu da kuma iOS.
ucpipagetext_line8: An haɗa Crypto da Fiath mafita
ucpipagetext_line9: UCPI dandamali ne na canji wanda aka tsara don sake fasalin yanayin kuɗin kuɗin duniya.
ucpipagetext_line11: Tare da hangen nesa na hangen nesa na kudade, UCPI an saita ta zama mai canzawa a cikin biyan bukatun Crypto.
ucpipagetext_line12: Matakan tsaro na UCPI don amintattun ma'amaloli masu aminci
ucpipagetext_line13: Hanzarta ci gaba tare da hadewar UCPI na UCPI
ucpipagetext_line14: UCPI API Haɗin Hanyoyi don kowane kasuwanci
ucpipagetext_line15: Duba nan don haɗa da mai sarrafa biyan kuɗi na UCPI da yawa.
ucpipagetext_line17: UCPI yana ba da bayanin martaba na Crypto ɗin da aka haɗa, yana inganta dukkanin dukiyar ku na cikin amintacciyar tsaro, mai sauƙin sarrafawa.
ucpipagetext_line19: Muna amfani da kwandon kwanonu, AES, da PKI na ɓoye don kiyaye bayananku lafiya da amintacciya yayin aika shi akan Intanet.
ucpipagetext_line21: Wallets marasa tsaro na Paycio suna ba ka damar kiyaye makullin makullin ku, tabbatar da dukiyar crypto ɗinku ba tare da dogaro da kowane ɓangare na uku ba.
ucpipagetext_line23: UCPI yana amfani da ɓoye-nuni don hana eaivesdropping, kiyaye ma'amaloli da crypto ma'amaloli daga idanu masu tafiya.
ucpipagetext_line25: UCPI ya kakku yana da bayanan crypto dinka da ƙarshen ƙarshen-zuwa-ƙarshen, tabbatar babu wanda zai iya yin amfani da bayanan da kuke da hankali.

faq_seapen_q1: Tekun teku yana tunanin ƙara yawan crypto zuwa yanayinsu.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_p1: Haka ne, zamu iya sarrafa sikelin Tearen da buƙatu kuma mu taimaka muku aiwatar da miliyoyin ma'amaloli yau da kullun.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l1: Abubuwan da aka sadaukar da kai: tura aikin girgije mai zaman kansa
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l2: Tsarin tsarin al'ada: Farashin tushen girma yana farawa 0.8% don kundin ma'amala.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l3: White-alama mafita: Haɗin Associations akan ƙofar ƙofar ku.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l4: 24/7 Tallafi da aka sadaukar: Anada kungiyar da aka sanya wa Asusun da ƙwararrun fasaha.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l5: Yarda da Tabbatarwa: Cikakken yarda da dukkan hukunce-hukuncen aiki.
faq_seapen_q2: Ta yaya wannan zai haɗa tare da abubuwan more rayuwa da biyan kuɗi?
faq_seapen_q2_a1_p1: Zamu kirkiri hadewar mara amfani wanda ya dace da abubuwan more rayuwa.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l1: Sanya Crypto a matsayin tushen tallafi tare da sauran zaɓuɓɓukan biyan kuɗi.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l2: Yana ba masu haɓaka don karɓar biyan kuɗi ta hanyar dandamali.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l3: Haɗa ƙofar biyan kuɗin ku tare da Paycio don allon daidaita ma'aunin Crypto.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l4: Mirror ɗinku na biyan kuɗin kuɗin apis don canje-canjen haɓaka ƙasa.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l5: Hadewar ba zai ganuwa ba don kawo karshen masu amfani;
faq_seapen_q3: Me game da bin doka da oda da kuma biyan bukatunku a duk faɗin ayyukanmu na duniya?
faq_seapen_q3_a1_p1: Muna gudanar da biyan hukunci ta atomatik:
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l1: Izinin yanar gizo: Muna kula da lasisin biyan kuɗi inda kamfaninku ke aiki.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l2: Yarda da kai tsaye: Gaskiya-lokaci AML / KyC da ke nuna duk ma'amaloli.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l3: Rahoton Rahoton: Rahotannin sarrafa kansa ga hukumomin da suka dace a cikin kowane ikon.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l4: Data Data: Biye da bukatun naúrar bayanai (EU, China, da dai sauransu).
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l5: Yarjejeniyar Sirrin: GDP da sauran dokokin sirri suna goyan baya.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l6: Tushen kula da mu zai yi aiki kai tsaye tare da ƙungiyar shari'a ta doka don tabbatar da cikakken jeri.
faq_seapen_q4: Ta yaya zaku iya magance kundin ma'amala na yau da kullun?
faq_seapen_q4_a1_p1: Abubuwan kayayyakinmu an tsara su ne don ɗaukar kaya mai ɗorewa:
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l1: Auto-scaling: sikelin ta atomatik don kula da zirga-zirga na 10x al'ada.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l2: Gwajin kaya: Gwajin riga kafin don tabbatar da damar da ake tsammani.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l3: Gudanar da fifiko: layin sarrafawa don ma'amaloli akan dandamalinku.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l4: Rarraba Geographic: Jarrabawar Multi-Yankin don ingantaccen aiki.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l5: Kulawa: Kulawa na ainihi tare da ƙungiyar ku a cikin manyan al'amuran zirga-zirga.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l6: Mun sami nasarar gudanar da karfin ma'amala mai yawa, kamar abubuwan da suka faru na baƙar fata ga wasu manyan dillalai suka sarrafa $ 100m + a cikin biyan bukatun Crypto na yau da kullun.
faq_seapen_q5: Mene ne tsarin kudin haɗin gwiwa?
faq_seapen_q5_a1_p1: Za mu ba da cikakken kunshin ciniki.
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_0_col_2: Da matukar raguwa fiye da masu sarrafa biyan kuɗi na gargajiya
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_1_col_2: Cikakken tallafin fasaha da ci gaba na musamman da aka haɗa
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_2_col_2: Abunda aka sadaukar da kai da kungiyar tallafi
faq_seapen_q5_a1_h1: Binciken Rob: Dangane da ƙararku, kimanta ajiyawar $ 50-100m idan aka kwatanta da masu aiwatar da biyan kuɗi na al'ada, da sabbin kudaden shiga daga abokan cinikin Crypto-'yan ƙasa.
faq_seapen_q6: Menene tsarin aiwatar da tsarin lokacin aiwatarwa yake kama da yanayin cutar na teku?
faq_seapen_q6_a1_p1: Zamu ba da shawarar wata hanya da aka yi amfani da ita.
faq_seapen_q6_a1_t_row_0_col_3: Tsarin doka, gine-gine na fasaha, binciken tsaro
faq_seapen_q6_a1_t_row_1_col_3: Ci gaban API, yanayin gwaji, shirin Pilot
faq_seapen_q6_a1_t_row_2_col_3: Kaddamar da Kasuwa, Shirin Mai gabatarwa, Feeding mai amfani
faq_seapen_q6_a1_t_row_3_col_3: Dukkanin kasuwanni, cikakken fasalin fasalin, kamfen tallan
faq_seapen_q7: Ta yaya zaku tabbatar da tsaro da ka'idojin tsare sirri waɗanda abokan kasuwancinmu suke tsammani?
faq_seapen_q7_a1_p1: Tsaro da tsare sirri ne na masana'antu, kuma muna haduwa da manyan ka'idojin masana'antu na Teighpen:
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l1: Mazaunin Sililin-Sililin: Ba za mu taba adana makullin kukan mai amfani da mai amfani ba.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l2: End-zuwa-ƙarshen ɓoye: Duk bayanan biyan kuɗi waɗanda aka kafa tare da matsayin Teepen.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l3: Sirrin sirri ta hanyar ƙira: ƙananan tarin bayanai, manufofin sharewa na atomatik.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l4: Tabbatarwa: Hadin kai tare da yatsan yatsa ko ID na fuska don izinin biyan kuɗi.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l5: Amintaccen Overlave: Leverging kayan aikin kayan aikin Tefennen don alamar ma'amala.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l6: Daban-daban Sirri: Nazarin da ke kare sirrin mai amfani na mutum.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l7: Dukkanin aiwatar da tsaro zai zama ƙarƙashin tsarin sake nazarin tsaro na Tekun Healpen da bincike na yau da kullun.
faq_seapen_q8: Wane taimako ne mai gudana da gyarawa zai karba?
faq_seapen_q8_a1_p1: Muna ba ku tallafin kasuwancin mu:
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l1: Kungiyar Asusun da aka sadaukar: Mai amfani mai martaba, jagorancin fasaha, da kuma kwararre masifa.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l2: Tallafi na 24/7: layin kai tsaye tare da lokacin amsawa na mintina 15 don ƙarin batutuwa.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l3: Binciken Kasuwanci na Quarterly Reviews: Tsarin dabarun shirya da bincike na aikin.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l4: Muhimmiyar cigaba: ci gaban fasalin fasalin da inganta kayan abinci na API.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l5: Sabuntawa: Sabis na yarda da yarda a matsayin ƙa'idodi na busasawa.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l6: Ingantaccen aikin yi: ci gaba da saka idanu da inganta sarrafa ma'amala.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l7: Plusari, samun damar zuwa ƙungiyar masu zartarwa da kwamiti don tattaunawar haɗin gwiwa.
